title: Matimu yo koma ya Vutshila eXibakabakeni - Tempele ya Orbital
heading: Matimu yo Koma ya Vutshila eXibakabakeni
intro: Ku sukela loko ku rhumeriwe sathelayiti yo endliwa ro sungula hi ndlela leyi humelelaka hi 1957 , tisathelayiti to tlula khume ra magidi ti fike ti rhendzeleka eMisaveni. Eka nguva leyi yintshwa, vatshila va kumile ndlela yo ndlandlamuxa matirhelo ya vona naswona ndzhawu yale handle yi hundzuke muxaka wuntshwa wa canvas. Hi sweswo, swivutiso swa xisekelo mayelana na tipolitiki ta ku lavisisa exibakabakeni swi humelerile - hambi leswi misava yo tala swinene yi nga si hlanganisiwaka.

leonov.text: Ntirho wo sungula wa vutshila lowu endliweke exibakabakeni a ku ri xifaniso xa ku huma ka dyambu ehenhla ka Misava, lexi endliweke hi mutivi wa swilo swa le mpfhukeni wa le Rhaxiya Alexei Leonov loko a ri eka xikepe xa Voskhod 2 hi 1965 .
leonov.caption: Xiphemu xo sungula xa vutshila lexi tumbuluxiweke exibakabakeni, ni tipensele leti Alexei Leonov a ti tirhiseke ku xi dirowa. Xifaniso: Muziyamu ya Senthara ya Vuleteri ya Vatsari va Swihahampfhuka va Yuri Gagarin

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Endzhaku ka malembe manharhu, Moon Museum , pulati leyitsongo ya ceramic leyi ku vuriwaka leswaku yi fike yi dzima eN’wetini leyi nga ni matsalwa ya vatshila va tsevu lava dumeke swinene eU.S. hi nkarhi wolowo: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers na Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Xifaniso xa Muziyama ya N’weti lexi humaka eka xihloko xo sungula xa New York Times. Xikunwana xi fihla xifaniso xa Warhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Ku hoxa xandla ka Warhol loku hlohlotelaka - ehenhla eximatsini - swi endle leswaku phurojeke leyi yi va ntlhontlho eka swihangalasamahungu swa vuhlanganisi hi nkarhi wolowo.
moonMuseum.caption2: Xifaniso lexi New York Times yi hlawuleke ku xi kandziyisa, laha ntirho wa vutshila wu vonakaka ehansi ni xifaniso xa Andy Warhol lexi dirowiweke ekhonweni ya le henhla ya ximatsi.

fallenAstronaut.text: Hi 1971 , xifaniso lexitsongo xa aluminiyamu lexi fanaka ni munhu lexi vuriwaka Fallen Astronaut xi vekiwile eN'wetini hi mutivi wa swilo swa le mpfhukeni wa Apollo 15 David Scott . Mutshila wa le Belgium Paul Van Hoeydonck a a kunguhate, hi xiphemu lexi, ku tsundzuka vampfampfarhuti va swilo swa le mpfhukeni ni vativi va swilo swa le mpfhukeni lava feke eku yiseni emahlweni ka ku lavisisa exibakabakeni.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Xivono xa xiphepherhele xa Xitsundzuxo lexi siyiweke en’wetini endhawini yo fika eka yona ya Hadley-Apennine.

pioneerVoyager.text: Hi va-1970 , havumbirhi bya Pioneer Plaques na Voyager Probes swi veke swivandla leswintshwa swa vutshila exibakabakeni. Hi ku rhwala swiphepherhele swa aluminiyamu leswi nga ni nsuku leswi nga ni marungula lama vonakaka lama humaka eMisaveni ku ya eka vafambi van’wana va le xibakabakeni lava nga ha yi kumaka enkarhini lowu taka, va kombise vutomi bya vanhu hi swiaki swa byona swa xisekelo swinene.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Ti plaques ta Pioneer 10 na 11, leti rhwariweke kuya exibakabakeni lexi dzikeke hiva 1970s.

dove.text: Hi 1990 , Brazil ri siye xikombiso xa rona ensin’wini leyi hi DOVE/OSCAR-17 , sathelayiti ya vutlhari ya amateur leyi nga ni matimba lamakulu ya vutlhokovetseri. Hambi leswi muvumbi wa yona anga titeki tani hi mutshila, akuri matshalatshala yo enta ya vutlhokovetseri: yi rhekhodile marito ya vana lawa ya kombelaka ku rhula naswona yi ma hundzisele eka kutlula magidi mambirhi ya vatshila va radio emisaveni hinkwayo, yi hundzula CubeSat ya vuphayona yiva ntirho wa mpfumawulo lowu hlengeletiweke.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, sathelayiti ya vutlhokovetseri ya le Brazil leyi hundziselaka marito ya vana leswaku ku va ni ku rhula, hi 1990.

lastPictures.text: Hi 2012 , mutshila Trevor Paglen u sungule "The Last Pictures" , disiki leyi nga na micro-etched leyi nga na 100 wa swifaniso leswi khomanisiweke na sathelayiti ya vuhlanganisi ya Echostar XVI eka geostationary orbit. Yi endleriwe ku tshama magidi ya timiliyoni ta malembe, yi endleriwe ku hanya ku tlula nhluvuko wa vanhu tanihi nchumu wa vuyimburi wa vumundzuku bya le kule.
lastPictures.caption: The Last Pictures, ku nga disiki leyi nga ni swifaniso leswitsongo leyi endleriweke ku hanya nkarhi wo leha ku tlula vanhu, yi sungule hi 2012.

ulises.text: Hi 2015 , Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) yi sungule Ulises I , nanosatellite leyi ehleketiweke tanihi opera ya miehleketo ehansi ka nkongomiso wa mutshila Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Sathelayiti leyi yi yisiwe estratosphere hi baluni hi nkarhi wa Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Yi endleriwe ku buluka hi kwalomu ka tiawara ta mune naswona yi rhelela hi parachute.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, opera ya sathelayiti ya miehleketo hi Colectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: A ku ri hi 2014 laha ku rhumeriweke sathelayiti yo sungula leyi nga ni vutshila ntsena. Phurojeke ya ARTSAT-1 Invader ya Yunivhesiti ya Tokyo yi rhumele datha ya ndhawu eMisaveni leyi tirhisiweke eka ku vekiwa ka vutshila na ku tumbuluxa vuyimbeleri.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader framework na swiphemu swa switirhisiwa leswi nga sala eMisaveni.
artsat.caption2: mission [SPACE x ART] − nkombiso wa ku tlula Cosmologies lowu khomeriweke eMyuziyamu ya Vutshila bya Nkarhi wa sweswi Tokyo

kac.text: Mutshila wa manguva lawa wa le Brazil na le Amerika Eduardo Kac u hoxe xandla eka vutshila bya le xibakabakeni hi ku tirhisana na NASA na SpaceX . "Inner Telescope" ya yena ( 2017 ), leyi endliweke na mutivi wa swilo swa le mpfhukeni wa Mufurwa Thomas Pesquet , yi endle leswaku ku va na xifaniso lexi vatliweke lexi endliweke ehenhla ka Xitichi xa le Xibakabakeni xa Matiko ya Misava .
kac.caption: Theleskopu ya le ndzeni eka Xitichi xa le Xibakabakeni xa Matiko ya Misava, leyi tumbuluxiweke na mutivi wa swilo swa le mpfhukeni wa Mufurwa Thomas Pesquet, 2017.

enoch.text: Hi 2018 , CubeSat leyi nga tirhiki leyi akiweke tanihi phurojeke ya vutshila yi sunguriwile eka orbit. Yi endliwe hi mutshila wa miehleketo wa le bahamas Tavares Strachan , Enoch yi na xibya xa 24-karat-gold canopic lexi nga na xifaniso xa mutivi wo sungula wa swilo swa le mpfhukeni wa Muafrika-Amerika, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr .
enoch.caption: ENOCH (yuniti ya nkombiso), 2015-2017. R Tavares Strachan, xifaniso R Vatirhisani va Muziyamu/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Hi lembe rero, Orbital Reflector ya Trevor Paglen yitlhele yisunguriwa tani hi xifaniso lexi vatliweke lexi vekiweke eka CubeSat leyinga tirhiki. Ntirho lowu a ku ri xiendlo xa vutshila lexi a xi kunguhatiwile ku cinca ndlela leyi hi vonaka ndhawu ya hina ha yona emisaveni. A yi tirhisiwanga hi ndlela leyinene. Hambileswi yi nga si tshamaka yi pfuriwa hilaha yi endliweke hakona, yi pfuxe mabulo ya nkoka naswona yi koke tinhlamulo leti hisekaka eka vativi va tinyeleti, vativi va sayense, swihaxa-mahungu, vadyondzisi, swichudeni ni vanhu hinkwavo emisaveni hinkwayo, leswi kombisaka leswaku vutshila lebyi humelelaka a byi fanelanga byi humelela hi tlhelo ra xithekiniki.
orbitalReflector.caption: Ku hundzuluxeriwa ka Dijitali ka Orbital Reflector, 2018

others.text: Vatshila van’wana vo tala va hoxe xandla eka ntirho wa vutshila bya le xibakabakeni, un’wana na un’wana u tisa mavonelo yo hlawuleka eka ndzavisiso wa yena. Tiphurojeke leti xiyekaka ti katsa ndzavisiso wa Sarah Jane Pell wa mutshila wa astronaut lowu lavisisaka matirhelo ya vanhu eka tindhawu to tlula mpimo; Phurojeke ya Agnes Meyer-Brandis ya Moon Goose Analogue leyi kambisisaka switlhokovetselo swa matimu na swa manguva lawa swa ku lavisisa xibakabaka; Nongonoko wa Nahum wa AstroArts lowu fambisaka swikambelo swa vutshila swa microgravity; na xifaniso xa Arthur Woods xa Cosmic Dancer , xifaniso xosungula lexi kombisiweke exibakabakeni ehenhla ka xitichi xa Mir hi 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Hi 2025 , endzhaku ka malembe ya 4 ya ndzavisiso na nhluvukiso, mutshila wa le Brazil Edson Pavoni na ntlawa wa vatirhisani va swiyenge swo hambana va ta sungula Orbital Temple , sathelayiti ya vutshila leyi nghenelaka leyi rhambaka mani na mani emisaveni ku rhumela mavito eka ku rhendzeleka, ku tumbuluxa xitsundzuxo lexi katsaka hinkwavo ku tlula mindzilakano.
orbitalTemple.caption: Tempele ya Orbital eMercosul Bienal. Xifaniso: Clara Marques
